description: The TMK3 Technological Phase is the apogee of the robot civilisation. They show their full potential by greatly increasing their production capacity and creating buildings that can switch between static and mobile modes. It is in TMK3 that the Robots prove to be very dangerous for their opponents.
tooltip: Increases Buildobots building speed + 20% and Ladybots storage capacities + 100. Unlock Spacedock and Technical Center.
